definitions.definition: Often followed by up : to cast light on (someone or something); to brighten , to illuminate .
Often followed by up : to cause (someone or something) to be bright ( in various senses ); to brighten; specifically, to make (someone or something) energetic , or happy and optimistic .
Often followed by up : to become bright ( in various senses ); to brighten.

main_definition: ( transitive ) Often followed by up : to cast light on (someone or something); to brighten , to illuminate .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , figuratively ) Often followed by up : to cause (someone or something) to be bright ( in various senses ); to brighten; specifically, to make (someone or something) energetic , or happy and optimistic .
( intransitive , also figuratively ) Often followed by up : to become bright ( in various senses ); to brighten.
